message: Let's start with a fair split. I'll take 80% and you get 20%. What do you think?
You took 80%, now it's my turn to make a move. I'll take 60% and you get 40%.
I'm willing to compromise. I'll take 55% and you get 45%. It's a fair split, considering the reduced value of the money.
I'm not willing to give up that much. I'll take 50% and you get 50%.
